text:
Wallace Hall Nutting (born June 3, 1928) is a retired United States Army general. He was Commander in Chief, United States Southern Command (USCINCSOUTH) from 1979 to 1983 and as Commander in Chief, United States Readiness Command (USCINCRED) from 1983 to 1985.
From 2003 to 2007, he was Mayor of Biddeford, Maine.
